member.name: EMRLINETO
member.summary: The EMRLINETO and EMRMOVETOEX structures contains members for the and enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMRLINETO.emr
member.summary: Base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRLINETO.ptl
member.summary: Coordinates of the line's ending point for the function or coordinates of the new current position for the function in logical units.
